profile_positions.description:
• Worked as a Junior Scientist and TU Delft representative for the FP5 EU Project titled “Safe co-combustion and extended use of biomass and bio-waste in CHP FB plants with accepted emissions”
• MSc Thesis supervisor ET-2205 titled ‘Predicting particle size distribution for biomass combustion in bubbling fluidized bed’ 
• Experimental and modelling studies on Combustion and Co-Combustion of Biomass fuels in Fluidized Bed Boiler (PhD thesis):  Extensive work has been carried out on the combustion and co-combustion of biomass with particular emphasis on gaseous and particulate emissions and combustion efficiency. The aim was to find the optimal way to burn risky biomass and how and to which ratio can the clean biomass be blended with the potentially risky biomass. Also a comprehensive fluidized bed model incorporating solid and gas phases was developed. A novel discretized particle population model was developed and implemented.. 
• Co-operative teacher for the 5th year MSc course
